channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Gardening 101 With Melanie Walker
channel.desc: Melanie explores some water-wise solutions to help you pick the right one for your gardening space. Linda Galvad plants organic Zucchinis using heirloom seeds.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Scott's Vacation House Rules
channel.desc: In every episode Scott McGillivray helps make homeowner's dreams come true by unlocking the hidden potential in their dated, uninspired vacation property.

channel.title: Eyes for the Job
channel.desc: Chris Judge and Rebekah Higgs give tips for home improvement and accessibility tips.

channel.title: Escape To The Country

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Finest Homes
channel.desc: Palesa meets with interior designer Julia Day, who shares a recent project of hers. We also visit Durban to see a project designed by Hayley Larson.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Luxury Homes Revealed
channel.desc: On Luxury Homes Revealed today we are looking at 4 houses that personify luxury. The first home is located in Rancho Mirage, California, the second is in Midtown Manhattan, then to Brighton, Australia , and lastly, Palm Springs.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
channel.desc: Tammy and Dimiter promised their daughter Sophie that this is their forever home. Drew and Jonathan give the home a modern boho refresh.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: AfriMaxx
channel.desc: Afrimaxx is a show celebrating contemporary African lifestyle. The show seeks out the continent's finest design and lifestyle innovation across the spectrum - from interiors and architecture to fashion, arts, food and travel.

channel.title: Open Homes
channel.desc: Bessie takes us to the newest high-rise of Trendy North in Melbourne while Adam shows us how to cook in the kitchen.
